settings.text:
At the start of 1981, my Finnish Grandma worked as a store clerk at the local Finn store "FinnKraft" in Marquette, MI. My Grandpa was working at the local mine. My Father was a school teacher and an aspiring entrepreneur. Mother stayed at home to take care of the growing family.

A few months later, my grandparents and parents were given the opportunity to join together and purchase the then closing FinnKraft store. In May of 1981 the store opened under the new name Touch of Finland.

A decade later, my grandparents retired from business and sold their shares to my parents. The next ten years were spent innovating and growing the business while my parents also raised a young family of seven.


In 2007, Dad & Mom retired and I took over the business. Following in my parents footsteps, I continued expanding and importing goods from Finland while starting a new online webstore.

Now today, Touch of Finland continues to operate out of the same store in Marquette, MI.

- Bryan, Owner

settings.testimonial: Iâ€™ve ordered several items for Christmas gifts. I was born in Finland so this site is very special to me. My family loves to get gifts from my country!!
settings.author: Raija C.

settings.testimonial: Great selection of gifts from Scandinavia - staff were incredible in helping explain the many items - and were very happy to help me with all my purchases.
settings.author: Karen A.

settings.testimonial: Coming from Europe I get sweet reminders of Home when I shop there. Love all the variety of practical things, gifts and foods.
settings.author: Barb S.

settings.testimonial: It's always a pleasure to shop here. A very pleasant atmosphere with unique gifts in a variety of price ranges. It's really nice to be able to get beautiful items from local vendors, crafters and directly from Finland!
settings.author: Daryl J.

settings.testimonial: Love this place! Touch of Finland has a wide array of gifts and practical things across the board. My wife recently told me that her favorite gift was from here. Highly recommend it!
settings.author: Matt M.

settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Contact Us
